entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mapping same SignalR hub twice results in unexpected error #56652
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56651
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56650
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56649
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56648
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56642
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plainTextSansFilter #56641
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext, plaintext #56640
  • Perf improvement: https #56639
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in hybrid cache when locking #56638
  • Placing EditForm in Section Content Component Causes run-time error #56635

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56403
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56628
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation do not work with .net8 or recent version of visual studio #54445
  • Blazor QuickGrid not displaying correctly #56636
  • DetectAmbiguousRoutes on RouteTableFactory doesn't scale well with large number of routes #55114
    .NET 10 Planning
  • blazor.web.js using deprecated API according to Chrome Lighthouse. #56637
  • .NET Core 8 cookie value getting escaped #56256

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1d17ea1` to `34ad51b` #56646
    area-infrastructure
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message & Helper Class #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview7
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Bundle runtime .MSI's instead of .exe's #56632
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
